== Wakavali (564939) ==

Wakavali is a village in the [[Dapoli]] taluka of [[Ratnagiri]] district with an area of 431.61 hectares and harbouring 480 households with total population of 2001 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Dapoli Camp]] is at a distance of 12 km. Male population is 986 and female population is 1015. Scheduled Caste Population is 265 and Scheduled Tribes population is 51. Census Location Code of the village is 564939<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
